description: Manage revision labels assigned to traffic weights.

commands.name: az containerapp revision label add
commands.summary: Set a revision label to a revision with an associated traffic weight.
examples: az containerapp revision label add -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --label myLabel --revision latest
az containerapp revision label add -g MyResourceGroup --label myLabel --revision revisionName

commands.name: az containerapp revision label add
commands.summary: Set a revision label to a revision with an associated traffic weight.
examples: az containerapp revision label add -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --label myLabel --revision latest
az containerapp revision label add -g MyResourceGroup --label myLabel --revision revisionName

commands.name: az containerapp revision label remove
commands.summary: Remove a revision label from a revision with an associated traffic weight.
examples: az containerapp revision label remove -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --label myLabel

commands.name: az containerapp revision label remove
commands.summary: Remove a revision label from a revision with an associated traffic weight.
examples: az containerapp revision label remove -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --label myLabel

commands.name: az containerapp revision label swap
commands.summary: Swap a revision label between two revisions with associated traffic weights.
examples: az containerapp revision label swap -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --source myLabel1 --target myLabel2
